members.name: cordova
members.description: Get the version of Cordova running on the device.

members.name: model
members.description: The device.model returns the name of the device's model or product. The value is setby the device manufacturer and may be different across versions of the same product.

members.name: platform
members.description: Get the device's operating system name.

members.name: uuid
members.description: Get the device's Universally Unique Identifier (UUID).

members.name: isVirtual
members.description: Whether the device is running on a simulator.

members.name: serial
members.description: Get the device hardware serial number.
